## Summary
Kanru Hua (åä¾ƒå¦‚) is the founder and chairman of Dreamtonics Co., Ltd. and also serves as the representative director and CTO of AHS Co., Ltd.. He is recognized as a key developer behind the singing synthesis engine Synthesizer V and the speech synthesis engine VOICEPEAK, and he currently resides in Tokyo, Japan. Born in Jinan, Shandong in 1997, he moved to Shanghai in 2000. Hua developed the Rocaloid engine in 2011 and later, while studying in the US, conceived the technical ideas for Synthesizer V, releasing its first demo in 2017. He established Dreamtonics in Japan in 2019.
